verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H3128>Jonathelemrechokim,<s%> <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>took<s%> him in <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me, O <S%H430>God:<s%> for <S%H582>man<s%> would <S%H7602>swallow<s%> me up; he <S%H3898>fighting<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H3905>oppresses<s%> me.
My <S%H8324>enemies<s%> would <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7602>swallow<s%> me up: for they be <S%H7227>many<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against me, O you <S%H4791>most<s%> <S%H4791>High.<s%>
What <S%H3117>time<s%> I am <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> I will <S%H982>trust<s%> in you.

In <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%> I have put my <S%H982>trust;<s%> I will not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> to me.
<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6087>wrest<s%> my <S%H1697>words:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H5921>against<s%> me for <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

They <S%H1481>gather<s%> themselves <S%H3162>together,<s%> they <S%H6845>hide<s%> themselves, they <S%H8104>mark<s%> my <S%H6119>steps,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they <S%H6960>wait<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Shall they <S%H6405>escape<s%> by <S%H205>iniquity?<s%> in your <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H3381>cast<s%> down the <S%H5971>people,<s%> O <S%H430>God.<s%>
You <S%H5608>tell<s%> my <S%H5112>wanderings:<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> you my <S%H1832>tears<s%> into your <S%H4997>bottle:<s%> are they not in your <S%H5612>book?<s%>
When I <S%H7121>cry<s%> to you, <S%H227>then<s%> shall my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is for me.
In <S%H430>God<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word:<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%>
In <S%H430>God<s%> have I put my <S%H982>trust:<s%> I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> to me.
Your <S%H5088>vows<s%> are on me, O <S%H430>God:<s%> I will <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H8426>praises<s%> to you.

For you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death:<s%> will not you <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling,<s%> that I may <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living?<s%>
